definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
to go to work/to be on duty/to start work/to go to the office
scheduled flight/flight number/plane/scheduled sailing/sailing number/passenger ship
to finish work/to get off work
teacher in charge of a class

sentences.english: Chinese mainland part of the film and television industry friends want to shoot some students in my class.
sentences.chinese: 中國大陸幾個影視界的朋友想讓我班部分同學拍戲。

sentences.english: Rachel watches Ben while Ross has a meeting, and she teaches him all about practical jokes.
sentences.chinese: 羅斯開會，瑞秋替他照看兒子班並教他惡作劇。

sentences.english: Three classes for the Eleven-kings under the sky.
sentences.chinese: 三個班屬於天空下的精靈王。

sentences.english: She works hardest in the class.
sentences.chinese: 她在班中學習的最努力。

sentences.english: Please provide any playgroup or pre-school experience the applicant has.
sentences.chinese: 請提供有關幼兒曾修讀任何親子班或學前課程的資料。

sentences.english: Miss Liu is talking with some girl in your classroom.
sentences.chinese: 劉老師正在你們班和某個女孩兒談話。

sentences.english: We have five classes; therefore, we need five maps.
sentences.chinese: 我們一共有五個班，需要五張地圖。

sentences.english: The class consists of 30 boys an 20 girls.
sentences.chinese: 這個班由30名男同學和20名女同學組成。

sentences.english: Other significant subplots include the adventures of Lydia, the youngest Bennet daughter.
sentences.chinese: 其它重要的次要情節包括班奈特家小女麗迪雅的冒險。

sentences.english: He is the second tallest boy in our class.
sentences.chinese: 他是我們班第二高的學生。

sentences.english: This class was certainly a lively lot , to say the least.
sentences.chinese: 至少可以說，這個班是相當活躍的一個班集體。

sentences.english: Mary is the fastest of all the girls in our class.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗是我們班女生中跑得最快的。

sentences.english: We were planning on just having a snack and catching the early train.
sentences.chinese: 我們打算喫份快餐然後去趕早班火車。

sentences.english: Bannister refused to work within the confines of the belief of the four-minute mile.
sentences.chinese: 班尼斯特拒絕在“四分鐘一英里”的範圍內工作。

sentences.english: I only work part-time, two days a week.
sentences.chinese: 我只做兼職，一週上兩天班。

sentences.english: Ben had it out with his roommate about coming back home so late and making a lot of noise.
sentences.chinese: 是有深夜遲歸引起一連串噪音，班因而與他起了口角。

teacher in charge of a class
tai-pan/business executive/foreign business manager/top class of kindergarten or school grade
to divide people into groups, teams, squads etc
to study at the same school/fellow student/classmate/CL:位[wei4],個|个[ge4]
foundation of a University or College/school opening/the start of a new term
